text: Matera is a city in the area of Basilicata, in the southern part of Italy. It is the capital of the province of Matera. On October 17, 2014, Matera was declared Italian host of European Capital of Culture for 2019 ==References== Category:World Heritage Sites in Italy Category:Cities in Basilicata Category:Capital cities in Italy Category:Settlements in Matera
title: Matera
